video.title: Carita de Angel
video.synopsis: When 5-year-old Dulce María's mother dies, her deeply depressed father, Luciano, decides to send her to a boarding school run by nuns.

episodes.synopsis: In a religious school in Mexico City, a group of five-year-old girls sing and do gymnastics under the watchful eyes of the nuns.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Dulce Maria is jealous of Nicole and her father. The girl gets into a fist fight with her ¿¿friend Barbara.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Luciano goes to the school to find out who gave the mouse to Dulce Maria. Silvestre takes her to the market, where a seller gives her a puppy.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Dulce Maria tries to convince his father of how pretty Sister Cecilia is and that she would like her to marry a good-looking man like him.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Sister Cecilia blames herself for giving Dulce María bad advice about Nicole and ruining the trip to the amusement park.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Dulce María is delighted to hear good news from her father, but when she finds out he's marrying Nicole, she feels sad and disappointed.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Dulce María escapes from the school with her dog Chiripa. Both the nuns and her family are very worried about her.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Nicole shows up on the pretext of seeing if Dulce María is well. Dulce María reminds Luciano of his promise to give his mother a gift.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Luciano tells Cecilia that Dulce María wants her to marry. Dulce María tells Angélica that she thinks of Cecilia like a mother.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Valente and a kidnapper approach Estefanía's car, but they can't pull off their plan. Luciano gives Nicole an engagement ring.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Dulce Maria and Estefania walk to a remote cabin looking for help after their car gets stuck in the mud near the volcano Ajusco.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Nicole and Dulce María spend the day together. Estefanía tells Domínica Nicole doesn't like Dulce María.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Dulce Maria is still naughty but her father Luciano adores her. Luciano is upset with Nicole because of her lack of interest in the girl's welfare.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Rossi takes Luciano and Leonel to jail. Luciano wasn't able to get married, but Dulce María and the sisters are happy.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Nicole visits Luciano and tells him that her family is doing everything to keep him in jail. Nicole attacks Dulce María after they argue.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Rómulo gives Leonel and Domínica his blessing and Father Gabriel performs the ceremony. Estefanía tells Dulce Maria her father did not marry Nicole.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Dulce María discovers that she can't pawn Chiripa. Estefanía asks the Reverend Mother not to say anything. Sisters Cecilia and Fortunata are worried.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Luciano enjoys going out on Saturday nights. Out of jealousy, Dulce María tells Sisters Cecilia and Fortunata that Luciano has a new girlfriend.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Sister Cecilia is leaving the school. Reverend Mother prohibits Sister Cecilia from seeing Dulce María outside the classroom.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Luciano regrets asking Reverend Mother to keep Cecilia away from his daughter. Now that Cecilia is leaving, she realizes she is in love with Luciano.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Dulce María goes to visit Cecilia even though she was told not to. When she hears the voice of the Reverend Mother, she hides under the bed.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Dulce María tries to get expelled from school so she can go with Sister Cecilia. Meanwhile, the Reverend Mother decides not to transfer Cecilia.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Luciano feels guilty for scolding Dulce María and wants to make things right. He tells Estefanía that his world revolves around Dulce María.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Dulce María tells Lucía about Verónica. Verónica is very pleased with her new job, but Fortunata warns her of Mr. Larios's bad temper.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Verónica goes to the Larios house looking for work. Estefanía tells her she has to stay and talk about the job with Luciano.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Luciano, Estefanía and Dulce María return home to find Nicole is there. After complaining she has not heard from her fiance, they go out for a drink.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Luciano tells Dulce María that she reminds him of Angélica. Luciano tells Dulce María that his wedding with Nicole has been canceled.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: When Luciano cannot be found, Father Gabriel and Estefanía sign the waiver for Dulce María's surgery. Luciano feels guilty.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: Centavito cannot clean the girls' and the nuns' shoes at the school. The Reverend Mother doesn't accept Luciano's invitation to dinner.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Fortunata gives María Dulce Perpetuo Chacón's address. Verónica tells the sisters why Perpetuo kicked out his own daughter.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: Chacón gives Luciano a six-month extension and tells him to look after his daughter. Luciano gives flowers to Dulce María, Cecilia and Fortunata.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: Luciano tells Verónica about Angélica's death. Dulce María worries that once Estefanía marries Noé she won't love Dulce María anymore.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: Selene introduces herself to Estefanía as Noé's wife. Estefanía is shocked and feels terrible knowing Noé lied to her.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: Estefanía and Gabriel go to the airport to say goodbye to Luciano, Cristóbal and Victoria. Estefanía fears Luciano will fall in love with Verónica.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: Dulce María goes to Noé's office and finds a woman who claims to be his girlfriend. She tells Sisters Fortunata and Cecilia what she heard.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: Dulce María schemes to reconcile Noé and Auntie Pelucas. Disguising her voice, she calls Estefanía to say Noé has been in a motorcycle accident.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: Silvestre falls to the ground when Dulce María goes to say good night. She calls for help; they have to take him to the hospital.
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: Dulce María receives Luciano's letter saying he won't make it home for her birthday. She is disappointed and decides she doesn't want her party.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: Cecilia decides to leave the convent forever. The Mother Superior realizes she's doing it because she's in love with Luciano Larios.
episodes.title: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: Dulce María earns herself a punishment when she sneaks into the Reverend Mother's office to find Sister Cecilia's address.
episodes.title: Episode 40

episodes.synopsis: Sister Cecilia returns to her hometown and decides to leave the habit. When Dulce María comes around, she starts constantly asking for Cecilia.
episodes.title: Episode 41

episodes.synopsis: Luciano tells Cecilia that she looks very pretty in civilian clothing. He begs her to visit his daughter when she comes home from the hospital.
episodes.title: Episode 42

episodes.synopsis: Noé is going to buy the downstairs apartment for him and Estefanía when they marry. Cecilia blushes when she hears Luciano's name mentioned.
episodes.title: Episode 43

episodes.synopsis: Cecilia visits Father Gabriel and confesses that she is in love with Luciano. Frida and Lluvia play another trick on Dulce María.
episodes.title: Episode 44

episodes.synopsis: Dulce María asks Cecilia if she wants to be her mother. Cecilia tells her that in order to be her mother, she'd have to marry her father.
episodes.title: Episode 45

episodes.synopsis: Ámbar tells Luciano that she loves children and kisses him just as Cecilia walks into his office. Dulce María is not happy about Luciano and Ámbar.
episodes.title: Episode 46

episodes.synopsis: Sister Fortunata tries to put out the alleged fire and bathes Pascual from head to toe. Dulce María thanks God that the school did not burn down.
episodes.title: Episode 47

episodes.synopsis: Cecilia decides to go out with Luciano. Ámbar asks Dulce María to tell her father to call her. Clarisa wants Cecilia to date Homero.
episodes.title: Episode 48

episodes.synopsis: Cecilia accepts Luciano's dinner invitation. Dulce María tells Angélica that she wants Cecilia and Luciano to get engaged that very same night.
episodes.title: Episode 49

episodes.synopsis: With Verónica back, Cecilia is sad that she won't be Luciano's secretary anymore. Dulce María is happy that Ámbar and Luciano are not getting married.
episodes.title: Episode 50

episodes.synopsis: Verónica watches Luciano and Cecilia dance at the wedding. In Guanajuato, Noé leaves the hotel to go buy a bottle of champagne to celebrate.
episodes.title: Episode 51

episodes.synopsis: Cecilia says she went to dinner with Luciano for Dulce María. Usually an exemplary student, Lluvia's grades drop; she stops eating and cries a lot.
episodes.title: Episode 52

episodes.synopsis: Verónica is upsets when Luciano kisses her; she asks him not to do it again. Homero tells Cecilia that Luciano and Verónica are together.
episodes.title: Episode 53

episodes.synopsis: Estefanía asks Cecilia if she's made a decision about Homero, and she says she's not in love with him and doesn't want to be his girlfriend.
episodes.title: Episode 54

episodes.synopsis: Luciano and Cecilia get in a fight and she storms out of the office. He's mad, he can't accept the way she's treating him.
episodes.title: Episode 55

episodes.synopsis: Cecilia tells Luciano that she is not in love with another man. Dulce María tells the Reverend Mother that she did not write the end of the card.
episodes.title: Episode 56

episodes.synopsis: Luciano tells Estefanía and Noé that he will ask Cecilia to marry him. Cecilia confesses that she will sacrifice Luciano's love to protect Verónica.
episodes.title: Episode 57

episodes.synopsis: Dulce María is thrilled when Luciano comes to visit her at school. But she is sad and disappointed when she finds out Cecilia refuses to marry him.
episodes.title: Episode 58

episodes.synopsis: Luciano asks Cecilia to forgive Dulce María for her behavior; he affirms his love for her. Verónica has decided to accept Franco's advances.
episodes.title: Episode 59

episodes.synopsis: Dulce María tells Estefanía that she is certain that Cecilia has gone back to her hometown. Cecilia insists she can't go back to Mexico City.
episodes.title: Episode 60

episodes.synopsis: Estefanía convinces Cecilia to come back. Cecilia decides to verify Verónica's situation before she speaks to Luciano.
episodes.title: Episode 61

episodes.synopsis: Estefanía and Gabriel tell Luciano his plan is too cruel. Larios tells Cristóbal he's going to marry Cecilia.
episodes.title: Episode 62

episodes.synopsis: Dulce María asks Angélica when Luciano and Cecilia will marry. Luciano asks Cecilia when the wedding will be.
episodes.title: Episode 63

episodes.synopsis: Luciano and Cecilia are ready for their honeymoon. Luciano tells Cecilia he wants her to help him raise Dulce María.
episodes.title: Episode 64

episodes.synopsis: Fortunata and Cecilia beg Luciano not to punish Dulce María. Luciano desperately searches the hotel rooms for Dulce María.
episodes.title: Episode 65

episodes.synopsis: Dulce María is very pleased with the surprise she has for her father and Cecilia. Enraged, Luciano decides to send her to boarding school.
episodes.title: Episode 66

episodes.synopsis: Victoria doesn't take Dulce María home when she asks. When Luciano can't find Dulce María, Silvestre suggests that she may be with Victoria.
episodes.title: Episode 67

episodes.synopsis: Nicole returns to Mexico City and is dying to see Luciano again. She thinks that he is going to fall to his knees and beg her to come back to him.
episodes.title: Episode 68

episodes.synopsis: Aída convinces Luciano to see Nicole, who is ill. Luciano feels bad for her and goes to see her.
episodes.title: Episode 69

episodes.synopsis: Cecilia thinks that Luciano is cheating on her with Nicole. She wanders aimlessly until she goes to see Pascual and asks if she can spend the night.
episodes.title: Episode 70

episodes.synopsis: With tears in her eyes, Cecilia tells the Reverend Mother that she saw Luciano with Nicole. Reverend Mother scolds Cecilia.
episodes.title: Episode 71

episodes.synopsis: Nicole goes back to the United States to battle her illness. Fausto refuses to give Clarisa her pension and wants her out of the home.
episodes.title: Episode 72

episodes.synopsis: Down at the police station, Órnelas identifies Centavito from the sketches. Officer Elizondo has him brought in and Centavito confesses to everything.
episodes.title: Episode 73

episodes.synopsis: Officer Elizondo orders Luciano be put in jail. Luciano and Cecilia go out and leave Dulce María at home doing her homework.
episodes.title: Episode 74

episodes.synopsis: Estefanía and Father Gabriel find out about Noé's trick on Luciano and go to the Larios penthouse to set things right.
episodes.title: Episode 75

episodes.synopsis: Julieta, an old friend of Luciano's, is worried because she's lost her sight and needs an operation. Luciano does all he can to help her.
episodes.title: Episode 76

episodes.synopsis: Dulce María goes to Julieta and Dionisio's apartment. Julieta is nervous but she removes the bandage just as Dulce María tells her to do.
episodes.title: Episode 77

episodes.synopsis: Dulce María and her friends play cowboys and indians and tie Silvestre to a tree. Luciano catches them building a fire around him.
episodes.title: Episode 78

episodes.synopsis: Pascual tells Luciano that Dulce María spent many sleepless nights to prepare her notebook. Luciano feels guilty and forgives Dulce María.
episodes.title: Episode 79

episodes.synopsis: Toribio catches the girls spying and locks them in an empty room. Luciano and the others don't find them in the abandoned cabin; they go back.
episodes.title: Episode 80

episodes.synopsis: Luciano and Dulce María go to see Rutilo in jail and tell him that Cristóbal will represent him. He doesn't want his daughter to know he is in jail.
episodes.title: Episode 81

episodes.synopsis: When they think they're giving Juanita a warm welcome, Sisters Fortunata and Aurora find Dulce María fighting with Frida.
episodes.title: Episode 82

episodes.synopsis: Angélica tells Dulce María that Fortunata can take her to the prison to speak to the warden. Fausto tells Clarisa that she can stay at the house.
episodes.title: Episode 83

episodes.synopsis: Rutilo passes out in his prison cell and ends up in the hospital. Luciano picks up Juanita and Dulce María at school and takes them to see him.
episodes.title: Episode 84

episodes.synopsis: Dulce María gives Dr. Fragoso all her savings to operate on Rutilo. Some men who are with Dr. Fragoso demand an explanation.
episodes.title: Episode 85

episodes.synopsis: Lupita, Silvestre's niece, comes to Mexico City looking for her uncle. Dulce María decides to hire her as the nanny for her future little brother.
episodes.title: Episode 86

episodes.synopsis: When Rogelio decides to defend Lupita from the boys who harass her on the street, Dulce María warns him that one of them is very strong.
episodes.title: Episode 87

episodes.synopsis: Rogelio and Dulce María celebrate that justice has been served. Dulce María is surprised when Miss Gilda Esparza, an old friend of Rogelio, phones.
episodes.title: Episode 88

episodes.synopsis: Dulce María tells Gilda Lupita was disappointed when she saw her holding hands with Rogelio, because she's in love with him.
episodes.title: Episode 89

episodes.synopsis: Rogelio apologizes for Gilda's behavior when she curses Lupita. To celebrate their first anniversary, the Gamboas go out dancing with the Larios.
episodes.title: Episode 90

episodes.synopsis: Rogelio is hospitalized. When Lupita and Dulce María visit him, Gilda Esparza enters and kisses him passionately. Gilda orders Lupita around.
episodes.title: Episode 91

episodes.synopsis: Pascual visits Altagracia to get her not to sell the school. Old memories come back for Pascual and Altagracia, who were in love when they were young.
episodes.title: Episode 92

episodes.synopsis: Dulce María tells Altagracia what Pascual told her about his childhood sweetheart. Altagracia is touched and gives her a music box.
episodes.title: Episode 93

episodes.synopsis: Rogelio and Lupita go out to dinner at a fancy restaurant. Gilda runs into her friends and tries to ruin the night for Lupita by making fun of her.
episodes.title: Episode 94

episodes.synopsis: Minerva tells Lupita that she will do anything to get Rogelio back. Lupita is frightened, humiliated and upset. Rogelio also argues with his father.
episodes.title: Episode 95

episodes.synopsis: Luciano goes to the boarding school and the Mother Superior tells him Dulce María's been expelled. Altagracia is very pleased with Lupita's work.
episodes.title: Episode 96

episodes.synopsis: Cecilia is worried that she'll miscarry. Estefanía goes with her to see a doctor. Lupita is worried how her future in-laws will react to the wedding.
episodes.title: Episode 97

episodes.synopsis: Luciano is upset when he sees the ducks in the jacuzzi. Salomón tells Minerva that she will have to accept Lupita.
episodes.title: Episode 98

episodes.synopsis: Cecilia comes to but José tells Luciano that only a miracle could save Cecilia's child. Cecilia doesn't know that she will miscarry.
episodes.title: Episode 99

episodes.synopsis: Fedra is upset because Cristóbal won't go out with her. Cristóbal says he'd rather go out with Clarisa. Frida and Bárbara play a trick on Dulce María.
episodes.title: Episode 100

episodes.synopsis: Cristóbal and Luciano tell Rutilo that the judge signed his release. The Reverend Mother tells the class that Juanita's father is back from a trip.
episodes.title: Episode 101

episodes.synopsis: Dulce María asks her guardian angel to help her to find her brother. They take Luisito to appear on a television show.
episodes.title: Episode 102

episodes.synopsis: Dulce María cries when Luciano yells at her. Everyone is worried about Dulce María's poor performance in school.
episodes.title: Episode 103

episodes.synopsis: Luciano is ashamed he scolded Dulce María when she just wanted to help. He and Cecilia head to the ranch with the baby.
episodes.title: Episode 104

episodes.synopsis: Afraid Dulce María may be contagious, none of the girls come near her. Fortunata discovers the spots were painted on Dulce María.
episodes.title: Episode 105

episodes.synopsis: Cecilia feels awful when Luciano says that not only is he not cheating, but the diamond ring is a gift to commemorate their first kiss.
episodes.title: Episode 106

episodes.synopsis: Dulce María finds a baby all alone in a store. Thinking the child was abandoned, she decides to take the baby home. The child's mother is distraught.
episodes.title: Episode 107

episodes.synopsis: Dulce María is desperately trying to find Silvestre to get him to come back. Silvestre runs into Nieves, the new servant, and feels sad and put out.
episodes.title: Episode 108

episodes.synopsis: When the Larios and the Gamboas go to pick up Silvestre at the hospital, he is already gone. Anastasio convinces the butler to go back to work.
episodes.title: Episode 109

episodes.synopsis: Angélica convinces Dulce María not to invite her classmates to the ranch. Clarisa confides in Cecilia that she is in love with Cristóbal.
episodes.title: Episode 110

episodes.synopsis: Raymundo accuses Nieves of participating in the robbery of the Larios home. Nieves denies it but is still arrested. Estefanía and Cecilia believe her.
episodes.title: Episode 111

episodes.synopsis: Dulce María blames Luciano for the disappearance of Nieves and her daughter. Father Cosme offers them protection and food until she finds work.
episodes.title: Episode 112

episodes.synopsis: Dulce María takes up a food collection with all the kids so Fortunata doesn't have to go hungry during her punishment.
episodes.title: Episode 113

episodes.synopsis: Luciano complains to Morelba about her son's aggressive behavior towards Dulce Maria. She invites him over for a drink, making her husband jealous.
episodes.title: Episode 114

episodes.synopsis: Cecilia finds out Morelba went to Luciano's office. The jealous woman that she is, Cecilia starts a big fight with Luciano.
episodes.title: Episode 115

episodes.synopsis: Cecilia decides to leave Luciano but he refuses. They reach an agreement: they'll live under the same roof but sleep in separate bedrooms.
episodes.title: Episode 116

episodes.synopsis: Jimmy Lizarraga has an accident and is taken to Dr. Urquiza's clinic. His parents are relieved when they find out he's OK.
episodes.title: Episode 117

episodes.synopsis: Dulce María is unhappy at the school; she is mistreated and punished all the time. Everyone tries to convince the Reverend Mother to forgive her.
episodes.title: Episode 118

episodes.synopsis: Reverend Mother and Dulce María have a friendly chat in the cemetery. Reverend Mother shows Dulce María a photograph of Angélica.
episodes.title: Episode 119

episodes.synopsis: Lorena doesn't want to tell her daughter Noé is her father, but she does plan to let her know that Noé exists.
episodes.title: Episode 120

episodes.synopsis: Paco tells Dulce María that Chiripa is not at the house. Luciano tells Clarisa that she must tell Cristóbal that Fausto is back and wants her.
episodes.title: Episode 121

episodes.synopsis: Fausto goes to Luciano's office to find out where Clarisa is. Dulce María asks Centavito to deliver an anonymous letter for her.
episodes.title: Episode 122

episodes.synopsis: Dulce María loans money to Polito, a drunk. Luciano and the family think he'll never pay her back, but Dulce María believes in him.
episodes.title: Episode 123

episodes.synopsis: Dulce María goes to the hospital and tries to convince Hipólito to change his life. He tells her it's too late for him to change now.
episodes.title: Episode 124

episodes.synopsis: Zenón and Gaspar get in a truck belonging to the school and take Dulce María and Fortunata to a cabin in the woods against their will.
episodes.title: Episode 125

episodes.synopsis: The police cannot find Fortunata and Dulce María's bodies. Luciano tells everyone that the nun and child have been given up for dead.
episodes.title: Episode 126

episodes.synopsis: Commander Elizondo's officers arrest Sister Fortunata at the pharmacy. She is furious and cannot believe that they would arrest a servant of God.
episodes.title: Episode 127

episodes.synopsis: Dulce María begs Angélica to tell her how she can meet her grandfather. Angélica tells her about his depression and why Angélica never forgave him.
episodes.title: Episode 128

episodes.synopsis: Adolfo's driver crashes and notices the girl unconscious in the backseat. The police call an ambulance and she is taken to the hospital.
episodes.title: Episode 129

episodes.synopsis: Adolfo aks Dulce María to get Dr. Heredia to come immediately. The doctor suspects that Adolfo is beginning to care about his granddaughter.
episodes.title: Episode 130

episodes.synopsis: There is a new school principal. Reverend Mother Lucía replaces Reverend Mother Piedad de la Luz. Dulce María and the girls seem to accept her.
episodes.title: Episode 131

episodes.synopsis: Juanita and Dulce María decide to go down into a well shaft to save a kitten that accidentally fell in and got trapped in the well.
episodes.title: Episode 132

episodes.synopsis: Angélica tells Dulce María about the time Luciano saved a cat when he was a boy. Dulce María has her response ready for when Luciano scolds her.
episodes.title: Episode 133

episodes.synopsis: Dulce María organizes a protest over Sister Fortunata's replacement. The girls march into the Reverend Mother's office carrying banners and signs.
episodes.title: Episode 134

episodes.synopsis: Chiripa, Dulce María's dog, takes a fall and loses consciousness. Everyone is worried, and Luciano takes her to the veterinary clinic.
episodes.title: Episode 135

episodes.synopsis: Fortunata and Silvestre agree that the letter from Edgar to Dulce María asking for her hand in marriage is way out of line.
episodes.title: Episode 136

episodes.synopsis: Thanks to Estefanía, Luciano will ask Dr. Altamirano to lift Edgarcito's punishment. Dr. Altamirano lectures the boy.
episodes.title: Episode 137

episodes.synopsis: Luciano feels bad about punishing Dulce María. He goes to her room and kisses her on the cheek, which wakes her. She hugs him.
episodes.title: Episode 138

episodes.synopsis: Poli tells Luciano that she lives in Madrid with her husband Vladimir. He warns her that Cecilia is very jealous and doesn't know anything about her.
episodes.title: Episode 139

episodes.synopsis: Luciano and Cecilia make up. Paulina, Lucía's sister, undergoes heart surgery. Dulce María wants to throw Estefanía a surprise birthday party.
episodes.title: Episode 140

episodes.synopsis: Noé is on a business trip in Cancun. Dulce María organizes a unique party for Estefanía's birthday and hires a clown.
episodes.title: Episode 141

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Roa is not optimistic regarding Chavelita's prognosis: the polio has damaged his leg. He wants to do some tests before giving his diagnosis.
episodes.title: Episode 142

episodes.synopsis: Dulce María visits the sanctuary of the virgin of light, and the virgin touches her hands. Cecilia and Father Cosme are amazed.
episodes.title: Episode 143

episodes.synopsis: Paulina meets Adolfo Valle when she visits her sister Reverend Mother Lucía. They meet again at the Larios penthouse.
episodes.title: Episode 144

episodes.synopsis: When Adrián visits his sister Reverend Mother Lucía, Fortunata sees him. Lucía hires him as the school groundskeeper.
episodes.title: Episode 145

episodes.synopsis: Dulce Maria and Jimmy pretend to be mannequins during the robbery. Cecilia and Estefanía become frantic when they can't find the children.
episodes.title: Episode 146

episodes.synopsis: Don Adolfo receives a disconcerting gift apparently from Paulina. Luciano wants to give Pascual some advice about his Arabic friends.
episodes.title: Episode 147

episodes.synopsis: Dulce María goes to the building's party room to meet the ghost lady, who turns out to be Estefanía, eager to learn Dulce María's secret.
episodes.title: Episode 148

episodes.synopsis: When the police arrive, Adrián is forced to give back the money he stole from Lucía. Adolfo is furious with Paulina over her romantic advances.
episodes.title: Episode 149

episodes.synopsis: Luciano invites Pablito to eat at a restaurant, but the head waiter, Mr. Magaña, refuses because he thinks it will ruin the restaurant's reputation.
episodes.title: Episode 150

episodes.synopsis: On the flight to Miami, Adrian surprises the Larios family when he diverts the plane to the Dominican Republic. Lucía notes that Adrián is missing.
episodes.title: Episode 151

episodes.synopsis: Luciano returns to the plane for the suitcases and notices Adrián is gone. The Gamboas and Father Gabriel can't believe the news about the accident.
episodes.title: Episode 152

episodes.synopsis: Luciano tries to fix the radio. Cecilia is bitten by a tarantula and faints. Back in Mexico City, people are worried about the travellers.
episodes.title: Episode 153

episodes.synopsis: Adrián ignores Luciano's pleas to give Dulce María back to him. Lucía and Elizondo also beg him. Finally, Adrián lets the girl go.
episodes.title: Episode 154

episodes.synopsis: Dulce María makes a date to have dinner with Adolfo. Cecilia agrees to go shopping with Sonia and Pascual. Luciano doesn't trust Sonia.
episodes.title: Episode 155

episodes.synopsis: Edgar asks Dulce María to hide Bombo, the lion cub, to keep him father from selling him. Luciano has Sonia checked out.
episodes.title: Episode 156

episodes.synopsis: Dulce María refuses to keep Bombo at her house. With Noé's approval, Casandra tells Marcos to visit her. Pascual invests the money in Sonia's name.
episodes.title: Episode 157

episodes.synopsis: Once again, Frida and Bárbara play a trick on Dulce María: tripping her, which causes a bucket of water to fall on the head of an inspector.
episodes.title: Episode 158

episodes.synopsis: Casandra begs Estefanía not to tell her father about the incident at the club. Estefanía asks her not to think of her as an enemy.
episodes.title: Episode 159

episodes.synopsis: Saturno finds a way to blackmail Estefanía. Ernesto and Soraya are two crooks who try to extort money from Estefanía asking her to sign a guarantee.
episodes.title: Episode 160

episodes.synopsis: Luciano tells Estefanía she should tell Noé about her issues with Casandra, but she thinks Noé won't believe her and she's afraid of losing him.
episodes.title: Episode 161

episodes.synopsis: Dulce María's trick for Bárbara and Frida is all set. She plans to hose them down with the garden hose. Some inspectors arrive to check on the school.
episodes.title: Episode 162

episodes.synopsis: Estefanía promises Casandra she won't say anything about the punishment for the sake of Noé and Marcos. Sonia is taken to the hospital.
episodes.title: Episode 163

episodes.synopsis: Casandra catches Estefanía talking in the phone with Ernesto. Dulce María tries to help Irma buy herself a father, but they fail.
episodes.title: Episode 164

episodes.synopsis: Casandra kills Estefanía's favorite plant. Estefanía decides to tell Noé the truth. Frida has a new little brother and she feels less loved.
episodes.title: Episode 165

episodes.synopsis: Noé confronts Estefanía with the photos and the report about her. She tells him the truth about Ernesto and says Casandra hired the detective.
episodes.title: Episode 166

episodes.synopsis: Estefanía is upset over Noé, and she tells Dulce María she's going to leave the home forever and she's never coming back.
episodes.title: Episode 167

episodes.synopsis: Dulce María is happy that they will soon legally adopt Irma. Paulina and Adolfo will be married in three weeks. Casandra talks to Estefanía.
episodes.title: Episode 168

episodes.synopsis: Dulce María plans a way to put her aunt Estefanía and uncle Noé back on friendly terms. Casandra argues with Esperanza and kicks her out.
episodes.title: Episode 169

episodes.synopsis: Casandra demands that Estefanía not be allowed to come home; she tells Noé he must choose between her and his wife.
episodes.title: Episode 170

episodes.synopsis: Extremely jealous, Casandra does not want Estefanía's new baby to be born. Casandra lies to Dulce María about her aunt's health.
episodes.title: Episode 171

episodes.synopsis: Emmanuel runs into Luciano and asks Larios about Atenea's photograph. Fortunata tells Luciano that Emmanuel knows about the photo.
episodes.title: Episode 172

episodes.synopsis: Luciano receives a letter from a secret admirer. However, it was Cecilia who wrote it to test him. Luciano is baffled and rips the letter to pieces.
episodes.title: Episode 173

episodes.synopsis: Following an argument with Casandra, Estefanía falls down the stairs and is knocked unconscious. Dulce María and Bárbara fight over her dress.
episodes.title: Episode 174

episodes.synopsis: Casandra and Saturno kidnap Dulce María and make their getaway in a helicopter. Luciano, Noé and Officer Elizondo yell from the rooftop.
episodes.title: Episode 175
